feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for ShelfPlayer: New now playing animation & Bookmarks
entry.content:
• Fix series matching
  • Display buffering indicator in now playing bar
  • Downloaded items will now contribute to your listening statistics
  • Long press the skip buttons to seek to the previous / next chapter
  • New now playing animation
  • Added bookmark support

Some additional bug fixes

entry.title: New release for ShelfPlayer: iPadOS app
entry.content:
This update adds a native iPadOS app

  • Added 20 seconds seek option
  • Fix tips
  • Fix progress indicator
  • Make progress easier to read
  • Make padding consistent

entry.title: New release for ShelfPlayer: The Siri update
entry.content:
• Rework Siri integration You can now setup shortcuts for recently listened items. More general actions are planned.
  • Notifications and the player can now link to items

  • Improved the layout on iPadOS and added hover effect

  • Show remaining time in chapter in the notable moments sheets when the option "Show chapter track" is disabled

  • Listen to all skip & seek events
  • Clarify some translations
  • Hide bookmark button when playing episodes
  • Added support for images with aspect ratios other than 1:1
  • Layout fixes & improvements
  • Added custom tint options
  • Added option to disable serif fonts

entry.title: New release for ShelfPlayer:
entry.content:
• Added a download progress indicator
  • Remember audiobook & episode playback rate
  • Custom playback rate & default playback rate
  • Account sheet overhaul
  • The progress indicator is now solid white
